description.value: Somewhere inside Jubilex's gelatinous form is a misshapen orb of harder slime, about 6 inches wide. This ball of slime is difficult to find amidst the puddle of ooze that remains of the creature's body. This orb retains its shape because it contains a collection of nerves, and one could argue is the creature's brain. The orb can be used to create a powerful gem.
